name: Qb²
description:
Qb² - A 3D puzzle game

You play as John Smith, museum security guard and... Oh no! You have knocked over all the exhibits. Please restore them before anybody notices!

A game about aligning the red spheres with the black cubes. Sounds easy, but can get pretty difficult.

Play in your browser: https://pavethem.github.io/qb2/

Source code: https://github.com/pavethem/qb2
